name: Put 3 Cooking Disks in the Cooking Specializer
Score at least 200k points in Tilt Island
Get hit by 2 Different Types of Cursya’s
Purchase all 3 Choco-Bars at the Twinkle Mart
Buy all 4 Inn packages (1 Flipside, 3 Flopside)
Reach level 30 of the Flopside Pit
Put 2 Cooking Disks in the Cooking Specializer
Score at least 100k points in Tilt Island
Get hit by 4 Different Types of Cursya’s
Score 25k amount of points in all 4 minigames
Reach level 20 of the Flopside Pit
